statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username FROM user_accounts WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, last_login FROM user_accounts ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_logins FROM user_accounts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logins > 5;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM user_accounts WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM profiles ORDER BY profile_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, bio FROM profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, profiles.bio FROM users LEFT JOIN profiles ON users.user_id = profiles.user_id WHERE users.username = 'Alice';
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%a%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(profile_id) AS num_profiles FROM users JOIN profiles ON users.user_id = profiles.user_id GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_profiles DESC;

SELECT username, email, last_login FROM user_accounts JOIN login_credentials ON user_accounts.user_id = login_credentials.user_id;
